Class SpecialEventsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.SpecialEventsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SpecialEventsImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpecialEventsInterface
    Handles special events that can occur during the game Interfaced by SpecialEventsInterface
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Eddie Eldridge
    See Also:
    SpecialEventsInterface

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpecialEventsImpl()
      Constructor that pre-loads any sound files and set's the volume to low

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void askAnotherQuestion()
      Function used to ask the player another question if they get one correct Used to check if a player is standing at a computer
      void askQuestion()
      Uses the generated question to prompt the player for their answer and checks to see if they were correct
      void checkLocation()
      Function to check the location of the player at any given time Used to check if a player is standing at a computer
      void generateFanfare()
      Generates some fanfare (Applause sound effect, dialog box congratulating the player)
      java.lang.String[] generateQuestion()
      Generates a question, the questionGenerated depends on the difficulty the player singleton has
      void showHelp()
      Shows the player the message shown at the start of the game when they press the 'H' key
      void showMoreHelp()
      Informs the player they must be standing at a computer if they wish to answer questions
